reviewText: I've been looking for this for 19 years. So glad I finally found it, and it's just as informative, and loveable as I remember. Great introduction for kids who want to learn about the titanic, and also good for an adult crash course.

This is a movie for kids which I didn't know when I bought it because there was no information about it on Amazon. If you can get past the stupid stuff it had good information. Just don't expect much.
